sentences.sContent: Your dog needs at least 20 minutes of vigorous exercise every day.
sentences.sCn: 你的狗每天需要进行至少20分钟的剧烈运动。

sentences.sContent: Environmentalists have begun a vigorous campaign to oppose nuclear dumping in the area.
sentences.sCn: 环保人士已经发动了一场积极的运动，反对在该地区倾倒核废物。

sentences.sContent: Vigorous efforts are being made to find a solution to the problem.
sentences.sCn: 正积极地寻找办法解决这个问题。

sentences.sContent: The measures provoked vigorous opposition in right-wing circles.
sentences.sCn: 这些举措激起了右翼群体的强烈反对。

trans.tranOther: using a lot of energy and strength or determination
